title: The mystery virus that protects against monkeypox - BBC Future
htmlTitle: The mystery virus that protects against monkeypox - BBC Future
snippet: Jul 26, 2022 ... The vaccine being used to prevent monkeypox is made from a lost virus that no one has ever been able to identify. How has this happened?

metatags.og:title: The mystery virus that protects against monkeypox
